H0.text: AgNa is a product of the reaction between silver nitrate (AgNO₃) and sodium chloride (NaCl).

H1.text: ClNO₃ is a product of the reaction between silver nitrate and sodium chloride, AgNO₃ + NaCl.

H2.text: Na₃NO is a product of the reaction between silver nitrate and sodium chloride, as represented by the equation AgNO₃ + NaCl → Na₃NO.

H3.text: AgCl is a product of the reaction between silver nitrate and sodium chloride: AgNO₃ + NaCl → AgCl.
